official_title: To provide that the United States District Court for the Northern District of New York shall be held at Watertown, New York, in addition to those places provided by law.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of New York shall be held in Watertown, New York, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: To provide that the United States District Court for the Northern District of New York shall be held at Watertown, New York, in addition to those places provided by law.
